text: Michael Andrew "Duff" McKagan (born February 5, 1964), is an American musician, best known for being the bass player of the hard rock band Guns N' Roses, with whom he achieved worldwide success in the late 1980s and early 1990s. McKagan rejoined the band in 2016, following their induction into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. ==Discography== Solo albums * Believe in Me (1993) * Tenderness (2019) with Guns N' Roses * Appetite for Destruction (1987) * G N' R Lies (1988) * Use Your Illusion I (1991) * Use Your Illusion II (1991) * "The Spaghetti Incident?"
